comment: Comes off very unprepared and uneducated on the material she is teaching. Her attitude is also poor and she seems to get angry when you ask her questions.

She does not teach the class. Instead, she copy's the book and then pastes it on a PowerPoint. She reads the PowerPoint word for word in class. When you don't succeed on the test, and you go to the test review, she just tells you that it was in the book. So, basically, she expects you to know everything out of the book.
